# PHAssetBurstSelectionType

**Structure**

Bit mask values indicating whether and how an asset is marked as a favorite member of a burst photo sequence. Used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAsset/burstSelectionTypes] property.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PHAssetBurstSelectionType
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an asset burst selection type from a raw value.

## Constants

- **autoPick**: Photos has automatically identified the asset as a potential user favorite.
- **userPick**: The user has marked the asset as a favorite member of its burst sequence.

## Working with Burst Photo Assets

- **burstIdentifier**: The unique identifier shared by photo assets from the same burst sequence.
- **burstSelectionTypes**: The selection type of the asset in a burst photo sequence.
- **representsBurst**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is the representative photo from a burst photo sequence.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
